title: New: Ecstasy – Teenage Coma
content:
Elusive London synth-pop outfit Ecstasy are rapidly proving their ability to pen arena filling, M83 style tracks, sure to prompt a flurry of A&R’s whipping out their blank cheque-books (this doesn’t happen anymore… much).

Teenage Coma is perhaps their most ambitious number to date, seemingly drawing from more clearly American influences than previous tracks. It’s sickly sweet, but boy is it absolutely fantastic.

‘I’ll stay by your bed for tonight, in the comatose light’
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
